name: Sudoku Solver
body:
# Sudoku Solver Recently, I have been having fun using SAT solvers for a variety of tasks. This time I thought I would model sudoku problems as a boolean satisfiability problem. I'm surprised it works so good. I tried it on the problem that comes up on googling `hardest sudoku problem ever`. It solved it within miniseconds and without a hiccup. Credit: Picosat has been used for solving SAT equations in this program.

Test to see if pure html works
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
